messages.name: invalid.entity.key
messages.text: A look up with the given key did not return anything

messages.name: valid.message
messages.text: This is a valid message used for testing purposes

messages.name: bulk.operation.failed
messages.text: The bulk save failed because at least one object could not be saved. The object IDs in question are: ${objectIds}

messages.name: contract.test
messages.text: This message can be used to convey information or error messages in support of general service contract testing.  Contract test method ${methodName}

messages.name: example.service.failure
messages.text: The process that you have attempted to run has failed. This is for attempt ${attemptNumber}
